United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit


No. 08-1855

                    UNITED STATES OF AMERICA,

                            Appellee,

                               v.

                         DARRYL DOWDELL,

                      Defendant, Appellant.


                          ERRATA SHEET

     The opinion of this Court issued on February 12, 2010 is
amended as follows:

     On page 51, line 11, change "547" to "548".
